main event: A civilian observed an object with the appearance of a balloon over a mining concern for a period of two hours.
interesting points: The object was visible for a period of two weeks, which suggests it remained in the area for an extended time., The object was initially thought to be a balloon, but the mining concern identified it as a meteorological balloon., The report mentions a similar object observed at Cajamarce during night-time observations by a weather station., Comments from the Preparing Officer suggest a possible hysteria regarding aerial objects following the advent of Sputnik., The report was reviewed and approved by senior US Air Force officials.
sighted object: an object with the appearance of a balloon
witness description: a civilian and a guest at the mining concern
